website_summaries.verdict: Although some size issues are possible, once you find one that will work for your pet, this casket makes an affordable, thoughtful, and eco-friendly way to say goodbye.
pros: Made of durable, biodegradable rice husk and bamboo fiber
An earth-friendly way to bury a pet
Small, medium, and large for pets of various sizes
Includes a seeded leaf to plant after burial and a sympathy card
cons: Choosing the right size is challenging, as some caskets are smaller or larger than anticipated
Some pet owners may prefer a more traditional casket

customer_reviews.title: I miss my sweet boy.
customer_reviews.text: Fit our 10 pound poodle with his favorite little blanket. Vet Tech curled him up so he looked like he was sleeping. Then we put his blanket around him. I'm keeping his cute picture up on my Amazon profile. My dear little Phantompoodle. 💗 13 years is just not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Phantompoodle

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item a few months ago as our cat was terminal and knew it would be needed. The day finally came yesterday as we had him put to sleep. When I tried to use it for it's intended purpose I had issues. The top would not stay shut and the clips that came with the pod did not fit. I had to secure the top with duct tape as nothing was working right. A truly frustrating experience on a day that was already a sad day.
customer_reviews.author: lubedude

customer_reviews.title: Very nice way to say goodbye to your loved animal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice way to say goodbye to your loved animal. Bought a medium and there was enough room for my cat and a blanket. Am missing my 16 year old kitty so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for me as I wanted something special for my Sammy but couldn’t afford a casket. I wanted a place to visit her and so I forgo cremation. Sammy was about 10 lbs when she passed. The size I ordered was medium. Her body was stiff but she did fit. It was a tight fit probably because of the rigamortitis. Anyhow, at least I have a place to visit my baby. She really was special! I can’t wait for the wild flowers to grow through the slate this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Amzel

customer_reviews.title: This may be a good product, but it is shipped terribly
customer_reviews.text: This may be a good product, but it is shipped terribly...It arrived cracked the first time it arrived, and the replacement was cracked, too. Both were shipped in over-sized boxes with a single sheet of package paper...The idea the item would not crack is perplexing...That I was unable to bury my darling cat and had to wait for a second item, only to have it arrived cracked, was very upsetting. Again, the packing is the problem...otherwise, I would have likely been satisfied with my purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Charlise Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Very sturdy product. Buried my 5lb chi-poodle with a smal, thin blanket and a couple of her toys. Really gave me peace of mind to know she will be fairly well protected from the elements for a while, but that she will return to the earth as the box biodegrades over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jkr

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We had to put our 16 year old Dachshund down. This POD is a great way to bury your furbaby. Nice construction and very sturdy. Seeds are a nice touch but really don't add much value. Only negative is the price. I guess compared to some of the dog casket the price is reasonable but I feel this size should be in the $50 range. All in all it's great and will fit a larger dog than our dachshund.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: a good product and wonderful idea
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a good product and wonderful idea. While a bit expensive, I actually returned it because it was too big for my 9 lb. cat (who is quite elderly and unwell). It was also too big for the space I am planning to use as a burial site. I don't recall, but the online description seems to only give the recommended animal size, rather than the actual dimensions of the pod. The latter would be helpful (if not already added to the description). Also, the package notes that the pod will not begin to breakdown for 3-5 years. I want something that breaks down much more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: A lovely product, especially if you can't dig right away
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we needed. Our fuzzy friend (a cat) passed from sight at the very end of winter, before the ground had thawed. This product provided a dignified place to keep her until we were able to be digging outside, as well as serving its final purpose. I love that seeds were included; we've decided not to use the included seed item, but to plant our own. A loving and lovely idea.
customer_reviews.author: fishdye

customer_reviews.title: Really small
customer_reviews.text: My tiny 8 lb car barely fit , I had to bend her legs. And so expensive. It’s unbelievable, I wasn’t happy I would go a different route for the rest of my animals. Their sizes are from really small to huge.
customer_reviews.author: Estelita Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice for last resting place
customer_reviews.text: Fit our 10 lb beloved poodle fine. As other reviewers said better than just placing in ground. After ordering I did get a disrespectful email from the company asking if I was "excited " my purchase was on its way. I complained and got a nice email back saying the email was sent in error.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Armendariz

customer_reviews.title: This pod was perfect and I couldn't have asked for a better alternative ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up building a large planter box to put this in, so I can keep my cat close to home and intact. Due to this obscure use (since the pod was meant for subterranean means) I ended up using some very durable tape to seal the edges. It's been a month and there's no smell. This pod was perfect and I couldn't have asked for a better alternative to keep the memory of my loved one alive <3 I didn't plant the seeds it came with, I purchased a variety elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: toffeeCoo

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED BROKEN WITH ESSENTIAL PIECE MISSING
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived broken today. There are two pieces that apparently are supposed to be glued onto the inside of the top portion to allow it to lock into the bottom portion. One of these two top pieces was missing (with marks indicating where it was glued/broke off). As a result the top does not snap onto the bottom (to 'eternally' enclose the pet). I wouldn't normally bother to write this except that the product costs 100 bucks. REALLY?!
customer_reviews.author: SimonSpeak

customer_reviews.title: Good but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was urgently waiting for my pawpod to arrive. My beloved cat Jasmine passed away before it's arrival. When I received it it was broken in two different areas. Inwas able to tape it so it could be used. Ihad to place Jasmine in a cold space to preserve her and just didn't want to have her there any longer so she could finally rest in peace. I was pleased with the pods appearance and overall quality but I gave it less stars due to the breaking of it during shipment. Perhaps better packing will prevent this from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Julissa Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Small for my medium size cat. The quality is very good, but the price was high. The large size is really too much $$.
customer_reviews.author: Nukkles

customer_reviews.title: but it was perfect. Large enough to wrap a small blanket around ...
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this would be too big to fit my 6lb. cat, but it was perfect. Large enough to wrap a small blanket around him and the locking raised lid offered the perfect amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: Loflin

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Felt better having bought this ahead of time, so I can lay my beagle to rest peacefully knowing her body is taken care of. The medium fits my miniature beagle curled up sweetly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice and simple, it is exactly what I wanted. The one I received was packed extremely well, a giant box containing a smaller huge box with lots of padding material. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lavender Blue

customer_reviews.title: Pet Casket or Burial Pod
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to bury our Family Cat. Quality exceptional. Used for a 16 lb cat with plenty of room. It's sad when your pet goes but it makes the situation a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Casket
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice but received it cracked. Didnt want to return because I wanted to bury pet immediately. Upset at the fact I'm burying my pet in a cracked casket though. :( Looks small on pics but goes all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Drew S.

customer_reviews.title: Gave us a bit of dignity and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. It made saying goodbye to our beloved large cat a bit easier. It's a way to dignify and pet burial. And you can write personal messages all over the pod. Can't say enough good things about it. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: News Producer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pod!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this pod even though we were burying our precious cat. It is sturdy, well-made and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: GLENNA ROSE RITT

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased
customer_reviews.text: It was good quality but the lid had a small crack in it. I didn’t have time to return it
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Well first of all this pod was delivered in one piece & was delivered the day our dog passed away so Thanks to all who had a hand in packing and shipping it. This pod was a perfect way to lay her to rest,she lived a long life and was a member of our family. We definitely would recommend this to anyone who unfortunately has to go through the loss of a beloved pet.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very sturdy product. And, it ended up being just the right size for my sweet 14 pound shih tzu/poodle mix after we had to put him to sleep. 💙
customer_reviews.author: Peach218

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that my furry family is going to rip Procted! When the time comes
customer_reviews.author: Lissette

customer_reviews.title: Lid will break!
customer_reviews.text: The lid broke when we tried to put it on. Not a very sturdy product. As far as size goes...our toy dog (a yorkie) barely fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Toste

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Size was perfect for my 14 pound shih tzu.
customer_reviews.author: Stephie S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was much nicer than expected. I will order if a need arises in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a very sad purchase but it was perfect to bury our littlest, most loyal friend in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Special Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product with great value during a very tough time. Thank you for your help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This casket is beautiful. It has a pretty leaf design on the top and snaps closed to keep your pet safe. It was the perfect way to honor my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, strong material but too short so had ...
customer_reviews.text: Misleading dimensions stated - 18? L x 12.5? W x 8? H The actual internal dimensions are 14.5 L x 12 W x 9 H. Good quality, strong material but too short so had to return.
customer_reviews.author: rekees

customer_reviews.title: Great for home burial, would use again.
customer_reviews.text: This product is surprisingly sturdy and was the perfect size for my small dog. I wanted to bury him at home and felt good about putting something in the ground that didn't harm the environment. Thank you for this product and the beautiful flowers that came with it as a marker.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: The medium was VERY small, and I would've ordered a large (for my 17 lb pug), but it wouldn't ship for 2 weeks (which I obviously didn't have).
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

product_meta.title: Paw Pods Pet Casket | Biodegradable Pet Grave Pod With Sympathy Card And Seeded Leaf | Plant The Seed For A Living Memorial Pet Grave Marker
feature_bullets: 【PET MEMORIAL CASKET】 A dignified way to preserve the memory of a beloved pet. Gone but never forgotten with a beautiful pet casket that doesn’t harm the environment.
【18" L x 12.5" W x 8" H】 High quality casket to fit a cat, small dog, rabbit, large bird, or similarly sized pets. Interior dimensions are 16” x 12” x 6”.

【INCLUDES WILDFLOWER MEMORIAL】 Each pet casket includes a memorial card and seeded leaf designed for planting with the PawPod. The leaf grows perennial wildflowers as a living memorial grave marker to your pet.

【BIODEGRADABLE】 Made of bamboo powder, rice husk, and cornstarch, the pet casket is very strong and durable. Harmless to the environment, PawPods will fully degrade in 3-5 years after the coffin is buried.

【TEACHING TOOL FOR KIDS】Featured in the New York Times and Hallmark Channel, PawPods are a perfect tool to help teach kids about the circle of life. PawPods can be decorated with paints, markers, and stickers, allowing for personalization and a unique special way to say goodbye.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
